content: विवरं {@--1@} A fissure, hole, cavity, hollow, vacuity; यच्चकार विवरं शिलाघने ताडकोरसि स रामसायकः <ls>R. 11. 18</ls>, <ls n="R.">9. 61</ls>, <ls n="R.">19. 7</ls>; धीरनादभरितकर्णविवरं प्रिये मदयंतिके इति व्याहरति <ls>Māl. 7.</ls> {@--2@} An interstice, interval, intervening space; <ls>Ś. 7. 7.</ls> {@--3@} A solitary place; <ls>Ki. 12. 37.</ls> {@--4@} A fault, flaw, defect, weak point. {@--5@} A breach, wound. {@--6@} The number ‘nine’. --रः Expansion.
